grapple@nexus.name: grapple
grapple@nexus.desc[0]:
This mountain grapple can allow people to cover great heights and
slopes easily.

alloy2@nexus.name: alloy2
alloy2@nexus.examine: What good is this unless you wish to make a polymer of some kind?

cube@nexus.desc[1]: A cube juts out halfway from the rock.
cube@nexus.name: cube
cube@nexus.examine: It's an ordinary, three-dimensional solid made of a type of granite.
cube@nexus.desc[0]: The cube is inset into the rock, having triggered an opening.

platinum@nexus.name: platinum
platinum@nexus.examine: Platinum would be drooled over by sultans and kings everywhere.
platinum@nexus.desc[0]: A bright, shiny element is here.

stump1@nexus.name: stump1
stump1@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump1@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

door1@nexus.desc[1]: The heavy metal door is closed.
door1@nexus.name: door1
door1@nexus.examine: Welcome to my humble house of torture.
door1@nexus.desc[0]: The heavy metal door is open.

nexus@nexus.desc[1]: The nexus vibrates with a significant amount of positive potential energy.
nexus@nexus.desc[3]:
The Nexus Staff has resumed its rightful place of holding in the
Throne of Torture.
nexus@nexus.name: nexus
nexus@nexus.examine: It is indeed a weapon not to be trusted in normal combat.
nexus@nexus.desc[2]: A staff here has committed the ultimate act of salvation demon containment.
nexus@nexus.desc[0]: The almost entirely usless Nexus Staff is propped by magical means here.

hulk@nexus.name: hulk
hulk@nexus.desc[0]: The shattered and burned-out hulk of a ship has been beached here.

clay@nexus.name: clay
clay@nexus.examine: Get enough of this together and you could build a house!
clay@nexus.desc[0]: A clump of mucky clay is here.

pinecone@nexus.name: pinecone
pinecone@nexus.examine: This could hurt the throat on the way down.
pinecone@nexus.desc[0]: An edible pinecone is here, trying to avoid such a fate.

cot@nexus.name: cot
cot@nexus.examine: Sleep could be just what the dwarven doctor ordered.
cot@nexus.desc[0]: A cozy cot is set up here for the weary paserby.

bottle@nexus.desc[1]: A wine bottle is three-quarters covered by the sand.
bottle@nexus.name: bottle
bottle@nexus.desc[0]: This seaweed-green wine bottle has sailed the seven seas for generations.

trout@nexus.name: trout
trout@nexus.desc[0]: The catch of the day, a trout, flops around here.

acid@nexus.name: acid
acid@nexus.examine: It is an industrial-strength chemical solvent.
acid@nexus.desc[0]: Noxious fumes emanate from this flask of acid.

scissors@nexus.name: scissors
scissors@nexus.examine: This pair is specially designed for a fisherman's tackle box.
scissors@nexus.desc[0]: A small, precise pair of scissors sticks blades-first into the ground.

silver@nexus.name: silver
silver@nexus.examine: Silver would be accepted by sultans and kings in some dimensions.
silver@nexus.desc[0]: A bright, shiny element is here.

rock@nexus.name: rock
rock@nexus.desc[0]: The rock appears to have some designs engraved in its surface.

overalls@nexus.name: overalls
overalls@nexus.examine: The word 'Hexnogon' is stamped on the lining.
overalls@nexus.desc[0]: A set of crumpled overalls lays in a pile of grease.

aura@nexus.name: aura
aura@nexus.examine: This mystical garment would fetch a hefty price in any marketplace.
aura@nexus.desc[0]: Woven strands of the fluid dynamics of the borealis are here.

letter5@nexus.name: letter5
letter5@nexus.examine: You see the shape of an 't'.

scales@nexus.name: scales
scales@nexus.examine: The word 'Skaraug' is stamped on the lining.
scales@nexus.desc[0]: A set of orange scales lies encrusted with blood.

chain@nexus.name: chain
chain@nexus.examine: The word 'Hexnogon' is stamped on one link.
chain@nexus.desc[0]: A heavily greased chain has caused many a welt.

fuse@nexus.name: fuse
fuse@nexus.examine:
Hell's Wire - a division of Cannonball Inc. Attach only after a
cannonball has been loaded!
fuse@nexus.desc[0]: A length of fuse has been dropped here.

shell@nexus.name: shell
shell@nexus.examine: The word 'Riffraff' is stamped on the inside lip.
shell@nexus.desc[0]: The cracked and broken shell of a fish is here.

stump6@nexus.name: stump6
stump6@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump6@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

ore5@nexus.desc[1]: The ore is black with the heavy oil on it.
ore5@nexus.name: ore5
ore5@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore5@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

stump4@nexus.name: stump4
stump4@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump4@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

block@nexus.name: block
block@nexus.examine: There is an irregular-shaped hole near the top.
block@nexus.desc[0]: A block of the same crystal as the plain stands here.

copper@nexus.name: copper
copper@nexus.examine: Copper would not be welcomed by sultans or kings in any dimension.
copper@nexus.desc[0]: A bright, shiny element is here.

stump8@nexus.name: stump8
stump8@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump8@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

letter4@nexus.name: letter4
letter4@nexus.examine: You see the shape of an 'f'.

desk@nexus.name: desk
desk@nexus.desc[0]: A messy desk lies in front of you.

baton@nexus.name: baton
baton@nexus.examine: The word 'Maestro' is stamped on the side.
baton@nexus.desc[0]: The baton of famous conductors is here.

cake@nexus.name: cake
cake@nexus.desc[0]: A slab of cheesecake is here.

debris@nexus.name: debris
debris@nexus.desc[0]: A small pile of debris from a once glorious cannon is neatly stacked here.

net@nexus.name: net
net@nexus.examine:
It's a new invention in this realm. Perhaps the old ways of fishing should
be replaced with this. Know anyone in need?
net@nexus.desc[0]: A large fishing net lays heaped up here.

oil@nexus.name: oil
oil@nexus.examine:
It is an industrial fuel used often to burn away unwanted compounds from 
mined minerals, especailly those minerals that were previously encase in
wood.
oil@nexus.desc[0]: A fresh can of oil stands here.

gate2@nexus.desc[1]: The rusty velvet gates are closed.
gate2@nexus.name: gate2
gate2@nexus.desc[2]: The rusty velvet gates are locked.
gate2@nexus.desc[0]: The rusty velvet gates are open.

berries@nexus.desc[1]: Here are berries ripe for the picking!
berries@nexus.name: berries
berries@nexus.examine: An odd assortment of blue and black.
berries@nexus.desc[0]: Some berries have been dumped here.

pelican@nexus.name: pelican
pelican@nexus.examine: The taxidermist left more than stuffing here.
pelican@nexus.desc[0]: A stately pelican with a pipe in its mouth stares sightlessly into the sea.

ore4@nexus.desc[1]: The ore is black with the heavy oil on it.
ore4@nexus.name: ore4
ore4@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore4@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

script@nexus.name: script
script@nexus.desc[0]: This kind of writing puts all other script to shame.

mold@nexus.desc[1]: The mold has been haplessly scattered about so it can infect everything.
mold@nexus.name: mold
mold@nexus.examine: A blistering green bubble of it grows more every year.
mold@nexus.desc[0]: A significant amount of mold grows here.

disc@nexus.name: disc
disc@nexus.examine: The Slicer - a division of Cannonball Inc.
disc@nexus.desc[0]: A metallic disc resembling a frisbee stands free from rust here.

cannonball@nexus.desc[1]: There is an RNA strand attached to this cannonball.
cannonball@nexus.name: cannonball
cannonball@nexus.examine: How uncool! This cannonball seems to have lost its helix and disc.
cannonball@nexus.desc[2]: The disc on this cannonball makes it look like a flying saucer.
cannonball@nexus.desc[0]: A shiny cannonball lies on the ground.

line@nexus.name: line
line@nexus.examine: Shorter lines would prove to be more efficient.
line@nexus.desc[0]: A mess of entangled fishing line lies here.

message@nexus.name: message
message@nexus.desc[0]: Some message sent by sea the old-fashioned way is here.

torch@nexus.name: torch
torch@nexus.examine: Idiotic Torches - still wondering how to put them out!
torch@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient but servicable torch is strapped to the wall.

door2@nexus.desc[1]: The heavy metal door is closed.
door2@nexus.name: door2
door2@nexus.examine: Welcome to my humble house of torture.
door2@nexus.desc[0]: The heavy metal door is open.

letter2@nexus.name: letter2
letter2@nexus.examine: You see the shape of an 'h'.

stump2@nexus.name: stump2
stump2@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump2@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

sceptre@nexus.name: sceptre
sceptre@nexus.examine:
I have the power to remove you from this domain if you treat me like a
magic wand.
sceptre@nexus.desc[0]:
This regal sceptre, made almost entirely out of compressed granite, has been
the symbol of power for years for the locally-dwelling race of rocks.

cannon@nexus.desc[1]:
A state-of-the-art and loaded cannon looks blankly toward a wall,
feeling a little defused.
cannon@nexus.name: cannon
cannon@nexus.examine: Useless Junk Inc. - guaranteed to fail!
cannon@nexus.desc[2]: A state-of-the-art cannon is ready to kick some stately booty.
cannon@nexus.desc[0]: A state-of-the-art and unloaded cannon looks blankly toward a wall.

elixir@nexus.name: elixir
elixir@nexus.examine: The small blue vial has an ethereal transluence swirling in it.
elixir@nexus.desc[0]: An elixir of restorative-type properties is here.

stump5@nexus.name: stump5
stump5@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump5@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

stump3@nexus.name: stump3
stump3@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump3@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

mass@nexus.name: mass
mass@nexus.examine: The perfect topping to any staff shaft.
mass@nexus.desc[0]:
A mass of an unknown material squats absently on the floor, humming
to itself.

sign@nexus.name: sign
sign@nexus.examine:
For all ye who would seek to enter the House of Quaron and confront Him, know
ye this:

    &+WThe great master has no weaknesses, no secrets to hide, and no phobias,
    &+Wwhether inherent or acquired.  He may only be contained by the charged
    &+WNexus Staff.  Use a mystical cloth from the aurora borealis to increase
    &+Wthe Nexus's power and capture his essence by using His favorite form of
    &+Wtorture -  the emancipated and efficient &+rdraw, &+rquarter, and disembowel&*.
    &+WTo save time, one must always abbreviate.  To escape from this realm, 
    &+Wone must possess the jewelrey of the master and successfully activate
    &+Wthe power of His throne.

&+wCory Deadhead - Assistant Back-up Waterghoul&*
sign@nexus.desc[0]:
A sign made of flowing human blood is here, its letters written in
glowing red corpuscles.

gold@nexus.name: gold
gold@nexus.examine: Gold would be gladly welcomed by sultans and kings in any dimension.
gold@nexus.desc[0]: A bright, shiny element is here.

rod@nexus.name: rod
rod@nexus.examine: An inscription reads 'Perhaps you are hungry. Throw me out.'
rod@nexus.desc[0]: A plain, wooden fishing pole lies here.

bed@nexus.name: bed
bed@nexus.desc[0]:
A bed of rotting timbers is the furniture for one wall in this
decrepit chamber.

rake@nexus.name: rake
rake@nexus.examine: The word 'Riffraff' is stamped on the side.
rake@nexus.desc[0]: This garden rake has not been used on leaves before.

nuts@nexus.desc[1]: Delectable nuts hang on nearby branches.
nuts@nexus.name: nuts
nuts@nexus.desc[0]: A pile of nuts is scattered here.

throne@nexus.name: throne
throne@nexus.examine:
For dimensional travel, please submit one charged nexus while wearing
appropriate attire.
throne@nexus.desc[0]:
A flaming throne made of bone well-dipped in adamantine is Quaron's
favorite chair.

mirror@nexus.name: mirror
mirror@nexus.examine: Nightmarish images of grues stare back at you as they brush their teeth.
mirror@nexus.desc[0]: Partially broken, this mirror isn't worth much to a beautician.

ore6@nexus.name: ore6
ore6@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore6@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

lnote@nexus.name: lnote
lnote@nexus.examine:
I have lost five letters from my new alphabet! HELP ME!
  - Screwball
lnote@nexus.desc[0]: A piece of paper is here.

square@nexus.name: square
square@nexus.examine: Find me four elements for my corners, from least to greatest value.
square@nexus.desc[0]: An intricately engraved square with perfect dimensions is in the rock.

ore3@nexus.desc[1]: The ore is black with the heavy oil on it.
ore3@nexus.name: ore3
ore3@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore3@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

letter1@nexus.examine: You see the shape of an 's'.

shaft@nexus.name: shaft
shaft@nexus.examine: The clamps on the top are designed to hold something.
shaft@nexus.desc[0]: A glossy, serpentine shaft is here.

dustbunny@nexus.desc[1]: A dustbunny cooked to the proper temperature simmers here.

dustbunny@nexus.examine:
It seems outrageously tasty, but the castle law is that all wabbits must
be cooked thouroughly by an open flame.
dustbunny@nexus.desc[0]: A raw dustbunny of unusual size can cause major allergies.

shard@nexus.name: shard
shard@nexus.examine: If you find the right hole, it might fit.
shard@nexus.desc[0]: A piece of the plain has come loose.

stump7@nexus.name: stump7
stump7@nexus.examine: Evidently, not of all this tree was cut down. Finish the job.
stump7@nexus.desc[0]: An ancient stump sits here, acting important.

fishhook@nexus.name: fishhook
fishhook@nexus.desc[0]: The stainless-steel, barbed hook is the lure of choice for many a fisher.

ore8@nexus.name: ore8
ore8@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore8@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

ore1@nexus.name: ore1
ore1@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore1@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

ore2@nexus.name: ore2
ore2@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore2@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

buckle@nexus.name: buckle
buckle@nexus.examine:
Even the leading banshees and ghouls of the underworld wouldn't touch 
this thing.
buckle@nexus.desc[0]:
A symbol of ultimate torture has been rather violently removed from its
previous belt. The buckle is covered in drawings of souls.

box@nexus.desc[1]: A valuable box here is tightly closed.
box@nexus.desc[3]: A valuable box here is sealed with an immense lock.
box@nexus.name: box
box@nexus.desc[0]: A valuable box here is open, exposing the velvet lining to the elements.

bones@nexus.desc[1]: Some bones from a thoroughly searched corpse lay scattered mindlessly.
bones@nexus.name: bones
bones@nexus.desc[0]:
A pile of bones with remnants of tattered flesh and clothing on it lies
stuffed in a corner.

letter3@nexus.name: letter3
letter3@nexus.examine: You see the shape of an 'a'.

ore7@nexus.desc[1]: The ore is black with the heavy oil on it.
ore7@nexus.name: ore7
ore7@nexus.examine: It could either be made from an element or an alloy.
ore7@nexus.desc[0]: A chunk of metallic ore is here, freshly dug up.

alloy1@nexus.name: alloy1
alloy1@nexus.examine: What good is this unless you wish to make a polymer of some kind?

helix@nexus.name: helix
helix@nexus.examine: Cytometalloidic Life Thingies - a division of Cannonball Inc.
helix@nexus.desc[0]: A helix reflects its golden, brassy light here.

gate1@nexus.desc[1]: The rusty velvet gates are closed.
gate1@nexus.name: gate1
gate1@nexus.desc[2]: The rusty velvet gates are locked.
gate1@nexus.desc[0]: The rusty velvet gates are open.

nexus32@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus32@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of 
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus53@nexus.title: Elbow of Lush Trail
nexus53@nexus.description:
Nestled in the outside corner of the trail is a broken tree, its trunk 
crushed and splintered by a pounding force that once passed over this area. 
A small family of foxes, also multi-hued, now live inside the devastated 
tree. The trail leads to the beach to the west and comes to and end to the 
south.

nexus20@nexus.title: Base of Some Rock
nexus20@nexus.description:
All around stand an inordinate amount of coniferous trees, their 'fruit' 
lining the ground from being blown off by recent storms. The undergrowth, 
composed of dry twigs and dead moss, crunches beneath the slightest pressure, 
giving perhaps an unnecessary scare to the small animals scurrying around.

nexus44@nexus.title: Sandbar
nexus44@nexus.description:
The bar is more eroded here. Pits in the path fill up with and retain water
as each wave passes. The beach lies a half mile to the west while an 
island is eastward.

nexus36@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus36@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus68@nexus.title: Magma Pond
nexus68@nexus.description:
The mad haze of red is all around with intermittent flashes of bright yellow
flame. Magma swirls around in a slow circle, always kindling the destructive 
potential here as a sort of undeniable threat to surface dwellers. The bottom 
of the pond is made out of frozen and compressed adamantium, the one known 
material which can resist any levels of heat save that of the sun itself. A 
stunning building made of the same material lies before one side of the pond,
booming ominously upwards into the redness of the pond.

nexus14@nexus.title: Gatehouse
nexus14@nexus.description:
This is a small room set aside withing the castle walls for the resident 
gatekeeper of this castle. The room is well lit by verious floating globes 
at out-of-othe-way places. On a rack against one wall is displayed the 
occupant's personal armor and weapons. A small desk in one corner is covered 
in the daily reports and dispatches that constantly flow through this place, 
but today, not one of the of the telegrams has even been opened and read.

nexus7@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus7@nexus.description:
The mist closes in and around, obscuring vision to a few yards. It is a 
low-lying, thick, purple fog in which streams of water vapor swirl in eddies 
and cause ghostly echoes off the crystalline rocks of the plain.

nexus21@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus21@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few 
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the  
otherwise darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles 
and threaten to poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting 
traveler. There are numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly 
breathing in the natural essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order 
of the day as a quiet wind whistles through the tree tops.

nexus3@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus3@nexus.description:
The mist closes in and around, obscuring vision to a few yards. It is a 
low-lying, thick, purple fog in which streams of water vapor swirl in eddies 
and cause ghostly echoes off the crystalline rocks of the plain.

nexus15@nexus.title: Courtyard
nexus15@nexus.description:
A wide avenue of crystalline cobblestones leads down the heart of this 
plaza, circling a fountain of incredible artistic talent and branching at 
that junction. Two small square edifices stand at the far corners of the 
courtyard, made of solid crystal. There is a deep thrum coming from that 
direction, vibrating the entire courtyard slightly.

nexus23@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus23@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of 
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus54@nexus.title: Clearing
nexus54@nexus.description:
The trail has an endpoint here, stopping in a large, irregular-shaped 
clearing. The southern side, however, is blocked by a large wall. The wall 
is vertical and stretches far upwards, but is not sheer. Perhaps it could be 
scaled.

nexus1@nexus.title: The Crystal Plain
nexus1@nexus.description:
The swirling purple mist clears in this region of the plain, allowing 
visibility to several hundred meters. Like the eyes of a hurricane, the sky 
above is clear as well, giving view to the legions of cloud castles above,
each floating on its own separate mounds of white fluffiness and ice 
crystals. A soft wind rustles slivers of shattered and reflective crystal
along the ground and propels the clouds in the same direction. The sunlight
that does manage to pierce through the gloom is partly absorbed, partly 
reflected off the plain.

nexus34@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus34@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few 
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the otherwise 
darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles and threaten to 
poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting traveler. There are 
numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly breathing in the natural
essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order of the day as a quiet wind 
whistles through the tree tops.

nexus8@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus8@nexus.description:
The fog is much less dense here than to the southwest and southeast. It 
allows more bright, yellow sunlight in, revealing the thin outlines of the 
cloud castles above. The wind has picked up considerably, driving the fog 
swirls faster and in tighter circles. To the north the plain continues as 
far as the can see.

nexus9@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus9@nexus.description:
Sunlight drives away the gloomy fog, showing the cloud castles in all their
splendid glory. They are quite close now, with the cloud bottoms a dark, 
fluffy white. A few birds native to the land, namely the Aqua Griffins, fly 
over the castles and land randomly on perches on the tops of towers. More of 
their kind zoom downwards to the ground to catch transparent fish from a 
stream which slices across the flat crystalline ground.

nexus67@nexus.title: Magma Pond
nexus67@nexus.description:
The mad haze of red is all around with intermittent flashes of bright yellow
flame. Magma swirls around in a slow circle, always kindling the destructive 
potential here as a sort of undeniable threat to surface dwellers.

nexus69@nexus.title: House of Minions
nexus69@nexus.description:
This is a place of residence without windows. The air is deathly still, and
even the loudest scream from the tortured sous far above do not penetrate 
these walls. Gargoyles are not lining the walls between the pictures of bad 
moons rising, but rather portrayed on the floor running and being swallowed 
whole by an army of nine-limbed horrors. Revulsion, insatiable hunger, and 
disfigurement are the way of life here.

nexus41@nexus.title: Messy Beach
nexus41@nexus.description:
The shoreline is crammed full of foamy wtaer, which has brought and dumped 
over the aeons a rather tremendous amount of floatable debris. Empty shells of 
crab, lobster, and mussel, rotting driftwood, and numerous species of seaweed 
lay strewn at irregular intervals. Not all is dead slowly petrifying, however, 
as twitchy movements in the shadows reveal the locations of some hidden nests 
of those who dwell in this intertidal zone. The usual sweet and salt smell of 
the sea is coupled with the screeches of the gulls as they zoom overhead on 
the sea breeze.

nexus63@nexus.title: Magma River
nexus63@nexus.description:
Pieces of ash and pumice buffet the bridge, which is quite transparent, 
allowing the image of one's feet dangling over a pit of death to become a 
reality. Deep-throated noises issue forth from the belching geysers far 
below, creating a hideous song.

nexus60@nexus.title: Magma River
nexus60@nexus.description:
Pieces of ash and pumice buffet the bridge, which is quite transparent, 
allowing the image of one's feet dangling over a pit of death to become a 
reality. Deep-throated noises issue forth from the belching geysers far  
below, creating a hideous song.

nexus39@nexus.title: Messy Beach
nexus39@nexus.description:
The shoreline is crammed full of foamy wtaer, which has brought and dumped 
over the aeons a rather tremendous amount of floatable debris. Empty shells of
crab, lobster, and mussel, rotting driftwood, and numerous species of seaweed 
lay strewn at irregular intervals. Not all is dead slowly petrifying, however, 
as twitchy movements in the shadows reveal the locations of some hidden nests 
of those who dwell in this intertidal zone. The usual sweet and salt smell of 
the sea is coupled with the screeches of the gulls as they zoom overhead on 
the sea breeze.

nexus35@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus35@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of 
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus65@nexus.title: Molten Bank
nexus65@nexus.description:
The rocks closest to the river slowly melt into the river itself.  
Eventually, the river will encompass this whole area and beyond. Part of the 
bank has collapsed, allowing the flowing magma to fill in the resulting  
crater. It is now filled to the brim and maintained as a sort of bay.

nexus18@nexus.title: Servants' Quarters
nexus18@nexus.description:
Three makeshift beds line separate walls of this drafty chamber, quite 
literally rotting away to moldy splinters. A tattered knapsack on the ground 
provides poorly-lit housing to a family of rats. Their squeaking matches the 
frequency at which the incoming wind resonates a burnt-out lantern hanging on
a hook just inside the door. In one corner, a bucket with insides covered by 
brown slime sits ensnared by a vine that snakes around the room. Behind it, an
ugly green lump of decay appears to be the capital of the mold civilization 
in here.

nexus62@nexus.title: Magma River
nexus62@nexus.description:
One bank of the river is in sight at the limit of vision in this hellish 
place, but a giant crack has occurred in the bridge. The crystal is warped 
and splintered, as if a giant, clawed hand had swept out. The distance is not 
so much that a running leap would fail.

nexus58@nexus.title: Plane of Torture
nexus58@nexus.description:
Cries of anguish echo around as their sources writhe in unspeakable agony. 
Skin splits, muscles tear, and bones shatter and then dissolve as countless 
victims of innumerable species are run through mercilessly again and again 
with blades of boiling acid. They are manacled so that their backs suffer the 
burns of vertical columns of magma. Their attendants are hooded behemoths 
clad in flowing crimson robes, resembling only hulking masses silhouetted in 
the red glaze of the molten rock. To the north lies a river of magma.

nexus51@nexus.title: Lush Trail
nexus51@nexus.description:
A flat trail leads up a slight slope towards the center of the island, 
looking recently trailblazed. Shde is provided often from the gigantic fronds
of the natural vegetation. On many leaves there are small holes where bugs 
have eaten and empty cocoons where the rare tropical caterpillar has undergone
its usual metamorphosis into a multi-hued butterfly.

nexus27@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus27@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of 
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus52@nexus.title: Lush Trail
nexus52@nexus.description:
A flat trail leads up a slight slope towards the center of the island, 
looking recently trailblazed. Shde is provided often from the gigantic fronds 
of the natural vegetation. On many leaves there are small holes where bugs 
have eaten and empty cocoons where the rare tropical caterpillar has 
undergone its usual metamorphosis into a multi-hued butterfly.

nexus47@nexus.title: Island Beach
nexus47@nexus.description:
The southern portion of the beach approaches a plateau atop the cliffs. A 
hundred feet below, the sea is much more unforgiving than to the northwest. 
High, frothy waves smash with heavy impact against the jagged, volcanic rock 
below, forcing the sea anemonies and many critter to crawl into the porous 
rock surfaces for shelter. Survival in this evironment has been rather scarce 
since the beginning of time due to the harsh conditions.

nexus49@nexus.title: Island Beach
nexus49@nexus.description:
A lushness of unsurpassed beauty, untouched by the hands of human progress, 
greets the weay traveler. The fronds of ferns and palm trees blow gently in 
the caressing wind. The beach here is devoid of debris except for small pieces
of driftwood.

nexus70@nexus.title: Attic
nexus70@nexus.description:
Someone has used this huge chamber as a junkyard for millenia, given the 
amount of antique items in here. There is not much gold, silver, or jewelrey, 
but one cabinet has a thousand small jars in it. The souls of all those 
captured by the demons of the Plane of Torture fly around endlessly in these 
encapsulated places, suffering as much astral agony as they do physical.

nexus19@nexus.title: Top of Some Rock
nexus19@nexus.description:
The pores here pock-mark the sunny slopes of the rock down to its base. A 
few white spots near the summit prove that some of the local birds have done 
their unwritten duty here. A set of stairs hand-carved into the side of the 
massive stone provides a means of getting down.

nexus45@nexus.title: Sandbar
nexus45@nexus.description:
The crosswinds buffet the yard-wide strip of sand, pushing water over the 
top of it as the waves crest. Bits of seaweed and other debris deposit 
themselves nicely on the path. On either side, the sandy bottom slopes gently 
downward, but the sea here islagoon-like and remains mainly under a fathom 
deep. Manta rays turn their natural camoflauge on in an attempt to hide from 
the sandbar travelers.

nexus38@nexus.title: Messy Beach
nexus38@nexus.description:
The shoreline is crammed full of foamy water, which has brought and dumped 
over the aeons a rather tremendous amount of floatable debris. Empty shells of
crab, lobster, and mussel, rotting driftwood, and numerous species of seaweed
lay strewn at ireegular intervals. Not all is dead slowly petrifying, however,
as twitchy movements in the shadows reveal the locations of some hidden nests 
of those who dwell in this intertidal zone. The usual sweet and salt smell of 
the sea is coupled with the screeches of the gulls as they zoom overhead on 
the sea breeze.

nexus48@nexus.title: Overlook
nexus48@nexus.description:
At 150 feet above the eroding rocks, the grassy tops of the cliffs rise to 
a tapering point. Tropical birds fly at these lower altitudes, gliding on the 
coastal breezes. Close to the edge, an ancinet &+Cbrick cairn&* stands for no 
apparent useful reason. On its top tier lies a small, wooden idol - an 
artifact to some long-lost deity, perhaps. The grass around the cairn grows 
more steadily compared to the rest of the plateau, where the weather 
continually gnaws away at the nutrients in the soil.

nexus61@nexus.title: Magma River
nexus61@nexus.description:
One bank of the river is in sight at the limit of vision in this hellish 
place, but a giant crack has occurred in the bridge. The crystal is warped 
and splintered, as if a giant, clawed hand had swept out. The distance is not 
so much that a running leap would fail.

nexus4@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus4@nexus.description:
The mist closes in and around, obscuring vision to a few yards. It is a 
low-lying, thick, purple fog in which streams of water vapor swirl in eddies 
and cause ghostly echoes off the crystalline rocks of the plain.

nexus28@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus28@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of 
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus33@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus33@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few 
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the otherwise
darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles and threaten to 
poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting traveler. There are  
numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly breathing in the natural
essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order of the day as a quiet wind 
whistles through the tree tops.

nexus29@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus29@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few 
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the otherwise
darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles and threaten to 
poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting traveler. There are 
numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly breathing in the 
natural essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order of the day as a quiet
wind whistles through the tree tops.

nexus11@nexus.title: On the Cloud
nexus11@nexus.description:
The rain producers provide a safe environment in which more about and 
although the altitude is great, there is no shortage of air. Tufts of white 
vapor swirl on all sides and bounce off the fate and walls of this particular 
cloud castle. From here, the edge of the clouds is visible as a frayed edge 
of ice crystals.

nexus13@nexus.title: Portcullis
nexus13@nexus.description:
The wind creaks through the cross-hatches of the portcullis, flexing its 
rusty, moss-covered bars eerily back and forth. On the tips of the portcullis 
spikes is the blood of the mantle that were impaled in a decisive, but 
long-forgotten battle. A gatehouse is to the east.

nexus64@nexus.title: Magma River
nexus64@nexus.description:
A narrow, crystalline bridge spans the river here, over a mile long in 
length. Bubbles of methane and sulfur dioxide gas explode from the depths of 
it, occasionally splattering the bridge with bits of burning rock, fresh from
the mantle of this planet.

nexus71@nexus.title: Basement of Flesh
nexus71@nexus.description:
The stench of death is comforting to this room. The walls are made out of 
pulsing human flesh, slowly glowing and oozing with a fresh mixture of pus and
blood. Standing next to each of these open sores is a giant black mosquito, 
its probiscus deeply embedded into the wound and body pulsing in sync with the
walls as it drinks its fill. At other spots, a shaggy-haired vampire rips away
the skin covering and pours grapefruit directly into the muscle, sloshing it 
around with its tongue before ramming the entire length of its six inch fangs 
into the tear ecstatically. This room represents the heart of suffering, and 
each new wound means another victim added to the continuous torture.

nexus16@nexus.title: Courtyard
nexus16@nexus.description:
The fountain gurgles with exceptionally clear water and provides some 
measure of life to this otherwise seemingly deserted castle. An intricate 
structure of mermaids and fish are entwining around the central part of the 
fountain. From the mouths of the fish and the ears of the mermaids pour 
forth not only water, but a deep indigo effervesence which makes the water 
sizzle and explode into a thousand crystal sparks as it strikes the surface 
of the water. It then proceeds to cause the entire fountain to have hundreds 
of small streams of bubbles float from the the base of the fountain to the 
top.

nexus6@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus6@nexus.description:
The mist closes in and around, obscuring vision to a few yards. It is a 
low-lying, thick, purple fog in which streams of water vapor swirl in eddies 
and cause ghostly echoes off the crystalline rocks of the plain.

nexus2@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus2@nexus.description:
The mist closes in and around, obscuring vision to a few yards. It is a
low-lying, thick, purple fog in which streams of water vapor swirl in eddies
and cause ghostly echoes off the crystalline rocks of the plain.

nexus56@nexus.title: On the Wall
nexus56@nexus.description:
The ground lies far below, and the wall stretches on. The higher the  
altitude, the more the crosswinds threaten.

nexus43@nexus.title: Sandbar
nexus43@nexus.description:
The crosswinds buffet the yard-wide strip of sand, pushing water over the 
top of it as the waves crest. Bits of seaweed and other debris deposit 
themselves nicely on the path. On either side, the sandy bottom slopes gently 
downward, but the sea here is lagoon-like and remains mainly under a fathom 
deep. Manta rays turn their natural camoflauge on in an attempt to hide from 
the sandbar travelers.

nexus17@nexus.title: Storage Room
nexus17@nexus.description:
This is a small square cell in which the inhabitants of this castle put 
some of their junk in. The floor is coated with several inches of dust and 
dirt, and broken furniture is thrown into a large pile in the corner, 
destined to mold for all time. A large wicker torch has been tightly strapped 
to one wall, like a punishment.

nexus25@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus25@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the otherwise
darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles and threaten to 
poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting traveler. There are 
numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly breathing in the 
natural essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order of the day as a quiet 
wind whistles through the tree tops.

nexus66@nexus.title: Magma Pond
nexus66@nexus.description:
The mad haze of red is all around with intermittent flashes of bright yellow
flame. Magma swirls around in a slow circle, always kindling the destructive 
potential here as a sort of undeniable threat to surface dwellers.

nexus12@nexus.title: Castle Gates
nexus12@nexus.description:
Frozen, white, crysalline statues of former rulers in bold poses cross 
their stern gazes at the staircase, daring any of those who wish entry to 
the castle to prove their worth. The gates themselves are lines with a velvet 
coating and adorned with brass buttons, where each button is forged under 
deep heat and emblazoned with this castle's coat-of-arms. The walls of the 
castle are extremely tall and sheer, appearing to be almpst made out of the 
same material as that of the far-below pain. Any attempt by besiegers to 
scale the castle would end in hundreds of broken bones.

nexus59@nexus.title: Magma River
nexus59@nexus.description:
A narrow, crystalline bridge spans the river here, over a mile long in 
length. Bubbles of methane and sulfur dioxide gas explode from the depths of 
it, occasionally splattering the bridge with bits of burning rock, fresh from 
the mantle of this planet.

nexus5@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus5@nexus.description:
The swirling purple fog reveals a solid wall of crystal nearby, the 
different angles of rocks reflecting images of other walls surrounding this
area on three sides. This crystal canyon has no major special features save 
that of a mount of white quartz near the back wall. It is of an odd color of 
white and being slowly eroded away by the fog and time. The wind picks up 
within this canyone as the air currents high up above force the air downwards.

nexus46@nexus.title: Island Beach
nexus46@nexus.description:
A lushness of unsurpassed beauty, untouched by the hands of human progress,
greets the weay traveler. The fronds of ferns and palm trees blow gently in 
the caressing wind. The beach here is devoid of debris except for small pieces
of driftwood.

nexus50@nexus.title: Island Beach
nexus50@nexus.description:
The beach narrows here; the sea coming close to the island's greenery. The 
sea bottom also begins to plunge down at a faster pace, and the waves are 
higher. To the south the beach opens up into a wide expanse, while the north 
cardinal features the entrance to a trail.

nexus24@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus24@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of 
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus31@nexus.title: Alcove
nexus31@nexus.description:
A solid line of trunks around and branches above form a cozy shelter. 
Althogh the solid wall of brown does not make a very attractive feature of 
the forest, an enormous pile of &+Gleaves&* on the ground is bathed in the only 
light which enters this area.

nexus40@nexus.title: Corner of the Beach
nexus40@nexus.description:
The beach extends to the west and north &*from here; the northern cliffs 
fading into the distance. The tide washes in a line to the south, but a 
curious turn of nature has arisen to the east. There the water is extremely 
shallow, and the sea bottom rises up to form a long sandbar.

nexus26@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus26@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few 
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the otherwise
darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles and threaten to 
poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting traveler. There are 
numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly breathing in the 
natural essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order of the day as a quiet 
wind whistles through the tree tops.

nexus10@nexus.title: Crystal Plain
nexus10@nexus.description:
The clouds now only allow sporadic sunbeams to strike the ground as the 
rays of ultraviolet radiation desperately attempt to weave through the maze 
of white fluffiness. However, slivers of crystal and small shards are whisked
away from the plain and shot up into the atmosphere by mysterious forces. 
Effortlessly, the crystal fragments are inexorably drawn into the cloud 
bottoms, where they vanish from view. All around the plain seems to be 
distorted slightly - the crystals warping, or maybe that is a trick of the 
sunlight.

nexus42@nexus.title: Messy Beach
nexus42@nexus.description:
The shoreline is crammed full of foamy wtaer, which has brought and dumped 
over the aeons a rather tremendous amount of floatable debris. Empty shells of
crab, lobster, and mussel, rotting driftwood, and numerous species of seaweed 
lay strewn at irregular intervals. Not all is dead slowly petrifying, however,
as twitchy movements in the shadows reveal the locations of some hidden nests 
of those who dwell in this intertidal zone. The usual sweet and salt smell of 
the sea is coupled with the screeches of the gulls as they zoom overhead on 
the sea breeze.

nexus55@nexus.title: On the Wall
nexus55@nexus.description:
The ground lies far below, and the wall stretches on. The higher the 
altitude, the more the crosswinds threaten.

nexus72@nexus.title: &+RMishappen Void
nexus72@nexus.description: This is the holding place of some nexus zone material.

nexus57@nexus.title: Top of the Wall
nexus57@nexus.description:
Five hundred feet separate the ground and top of this wall. The wind speed 
resembles that of the jet stream itself, powerfully whipping across the flat 
width of the top of the wall. On one side there is a spectacular view of the 
island, but on the other, a very dark abyss exists. Even the light of the 
noontime sun cannot make a dent in this bottomless shadow.

nexus30@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus30@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the otherwise
darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles and threaten to 
poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting traveler. There are 
numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly breathing in the 
natural essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order of the day as a 
quiet wind whistles through the tree tops.

nexus22@nexus.title: The Silent Conifers
nexus22@nexus.description:
The trees form a full canopy, completely blocking out the sun. Only a few 
dim streams reflecting around allow the unaided eye to penetrate the otherwise
darkened interior of this forest. Branches form at odd angles and threaten to 
poke the aforementioned eye out of an unsuspecting traveler. There are 
numerous lichen lining the bark of the trees, eagerly breathing in the natural
essence of the forest. Tranquility is the order of the day as a quiet wind 
whistles through the tree tops.

nexus37@nexus.title: Groove in Some Rock
nexus37@nexus.description:
This is a deep depression in the side of the rock, situated on the leeward 
side. The smoothness and cuvature of the groove suggests that the effects of 
erosion have occurred more slowly than usual, as there are no signs of cracks 
or water leakage. Some droppings and bones lay inside the fissure, awaiting 
the old ally of decomposition - time.

quaron@nexus.name: quaron
quaron@nexus.description: The demon lord Quaron awaits his next slave.

swarm@nexus.name: swarm
swarm@nexus.description: A swarm of gnats buzzes angrily around you.

minion4@nexus.name: minion4
minion4@nexus.description:
The maintainence man of torture is going to grease his machines with you. 
Hexnogon adjusts his tool belt and sneers at you.

fisherman@nexus.name: fisherman
fisherman@nexus.description: A fisherman tries out his new pole and curses his ill luck.

bagofwind@nexus.name: bagofwind
bagofwind@nexus.description: A large airhead floats before you, full of useless wisdom.

deer@nexus.name: deer
deer@nexus.description: A well-muscled deer whips by you.

fatbird@nexus.name: fatbird
fatbird@nexus.description: A rather fat bird attempts to poke your eyes out!

snake2@nexus.name: snake2
snake2@nexus.description: A crystalline snake attempts to serrate you quite painfully.

mosquitoes@nexus.name: mosquitoes
mosquitoes@nexus.description: A swarm of mosquitoes quickly sink their shnozzes into you.

crab@nexus.name: crab
crab@nexus.description: A crab crawls across the ground, attemping to nab your toe!

troutmonster@nexus.name: troutmonster
troutmonster@nexus.description: Never fear! Troutmonster and all its teeth are here!

fox@nexus.name: fox
fox@nexus.description: This quick &+Bblue &*fox couldn't jump if it wanted to.

snake1@nexus.name: snake1
snake1@nexus.description: A crystalline snake attempts to serrate you quite painfully.

screwball@nexus.name: screwball
screwball@nexus.description: A lanky Screwball failing at life is here.

minion2@nexus.name: minion2
minion2@nexus.description: The decomposing conductor Maestro waves his baton at you.

minion5@nexus.name: minion5
minion5@nexus.description:
An aquamarine-skinned spawn of the deep, Riffraff, is here to defend
its master.

lobster@nexus.name: lobster
lobster@nexus.description: A rather symmetrical lobster crawls across the ground.

minion3@nexus.name: minion3
minion3@nexus.description: Alberto the wind spirit is going to huff and puff and blow you down!

skeleton@nexus.name: skeleton
skeleton@nexus.description: Slurking about is a skeleton with a still-beating heart.

chipmunk2@nexus.name: chipmunk2
chipmunk2@nexus.description: Renwad the chipmunk somersaults down a nearby tree.

chipmunk1@nexus.name: chipmunk1
chipmunk1@nexus.description: Klathox the chipmunk has gone rabid in his senility.

minion1@nexus.name: minion1
minion1@nexus.description:
One of Quaron's minions, a scaly, orange reptile, has decided to pay 
you a visit. Skaraug has determined your livingness is just plain wrong.

wizardess@nexus.name: wizardess
wizardess@nexus.description: A wizardess of the earth tries to become one with nature.

whale@nexus.name: whale
whale@nexus.description: The shadow of a bulky whale looms over you.

snake3@nexus.name: snake3
snake3@nexus.description: A thick crystalline snake attempts to sleep soundly.

slug@nexus.name: slug
slug@nexus.description: There is a slug of inordinate size here. It is immune to salt.

minnow@nexus.name: minnow
minnow@nexus.description: A small minnow made out of pure molten rock swims toward you.

moldy@nexus.name: moldy
moldy@nexus.description: The thick arms of Mold Monster attempt to rot your pristine throat.

ent@nexus.name: ent
ent@nexus.description: One tree is very out of place here. Redwood Ent stands defiantly.

rockqueen@nexus.name: rockqueen
rockqueen@nexus.description: Grand Poomba Rockqueen of the rock stares sullenly at your mug.

bee@nexus.name: bee
bee@nexus.description: Words fail as you spot a bloated bee.
